title: Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When attempting to add Javadoc on a field in TH (presumably a class or file), nothing happens.
EB: From the context menu, when selecting the option to 'Add Javadoc', the action should add Javadoc on the selected field. Alternatively, the option can be removed from the context menu if it is not intended to function.
SR:
1. Open TH (presumably a class or file) that contains fields.
2. Right-click on a field.
3. From the context menu, select 'Add Javadoc'.
4. Verify that Javadoc is added to the selected field.
